channel.title: How do I make myself Owner on "Lost-Realm" Source, Client, and Matrix Cache?
channel.description: Hello, I have a question on how do I make my self Owner with the Owner crown on "Lost-Realm" Source, Client, and Matrix cache? Please comment below if you know how to. :D Thanks :D

item.title: How do I make myself Owner on "Lost-Realm" Source, Client, and Matrix Cache?
item.dc:creator: @amirparvis amirparvis
item.description:
@amirparvis wrote:

[quote=“Corylol, post:1, topic:533586”]Hello, I have a question on how do I make my self Owner with the Owner crown on “Lost-Realm” Source, Client, and Matrix cache? Please comment below if you know how to.
Thanks :D[/quote]

Go To your files
search for "player.java"
open it up and scroll down there should be codes like this

	if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Your Username"))
        {
        rights = 7;               //or what ever your owner rank is
		}

if not search for “rights” in your “player.java”

hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make myself Owner on "Lost-Realm" Source, Client, and Matrix Cache?

item.title: How do I make myself Owner on "Lost-Realm" Source, Client, and Matrix Cache?
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

Commands java Search for

Case “admin”

Change that name to your character name compile and use the command ::admin ingame.

item.title: How do I make myself Owner on "Lost-Realm" Source, Client, and Matrix Cache?
item.dc:creator: @Corylol Corylol
item.description:
@Corylol wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:4, topic:533586”][quote author=I Roll Deep link=topic=652378.msg4371319#msg4371319 date=1380747585]
Well the cache and the client doesn’t have anything to do with what you’re asking… navigate to your characters, open you acc and change rights to 2/3
[/quote]matrix isnt like that

should be a guide somewhere[/quote]

arham 4 can you please pm me how to do it? and also how to put the NPC’s in-game? Sorry I’m new to rsps :palm:

Read full topic
